str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To conquer, be victorious, overcome, prevail, subdue. From nike; to subdue.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From teros; to guard, i.e. To note; by implication, to detain; by extension, to withhold; by extension, to withhold.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
From a primary ergo; toil; by implication, an act.
As far as, up to, until, during. Or achris akh'-rece; akin to akron; until or up to.
(a) an end, (b) event or issue, (c) the principal end, aim, purpose, (d) a tax.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
From exesti; privilege, i.e. force, capacity, competency, freedom, or mastery, delegated influence.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Probably from etho; a race, i.e. A tribe; specially, a foreign one.
